statements: UPDATE supply_chain_data SET value = 25.5, location = 'Warehouse A' WHERE id = 1;

UPDATE Inventory SET quantity = 100, last_updated = '2022-01-15 10:30:00' WHERE location = 'Warehouse A';
UPDATE SensorData SET temperature = 25.5, humidity = 65.2 WHERE sensor_id = 101 AND timestamp > '2022-05-01'
UPDATE Inventory SET quantity = quantity - 2, location = 'Warehouse A' WHERE product_id = 201 AND last_updated < '2022-06-01'
